Font QTS

Updated: 10/10/18   -   v1.3.0 (Removed Font Awesome Icons due to new ng FA Treeshaking)     Changelog

31 icons - Grid Size: 16

For use in Static HTML Pages: Easy HTML font tags which automatically convert to inline SVG.

See Usage/Code Examples

All icon class names must start with 'fqts' (Font QTS), a space, followed by the icon name, then lastly the size and/or animation. See the examples below.

For this icon library to work, you must include the following 2 javascript files:
fontawesome.js
font-qts.js

Note: All icons inherit the parent tag/container's style properties (size, color, margins, padding, etc). Sizes range from xs (xtra-small) through 10x.

<i class="fqts fa-train09 fa-xs"></i>
<i class="fqts fa-train09 fa-sm"></i>
<i class="fqts fa-train09 fa-lg"></i>
<i class="fqts fa-train09 fa-2x"></i>
<i class="fqts fa-train09 fa-3x"></i>
<i class="fqts fa-train09 fa-4x"></i>
<i class="fqts fa-train09 fa-5x"></i>
<i class="fqts fa-train09 fa-6x"></i>
<i class="fqts fa-train09 fa-7x"></i>
<i class="fqts fa-train09 fa-10x"></i>

Animated Icons:
<i class="fas fa-train-cross-tracks fa-pulse fa-10x"></i> (Note: this is a placeholder for future icons where using an animation would make more sense.)

For use in Angular SPA's: run yarn add ng-font-qts and see code example in the qts-spa-starterkit: git clone https://github.com/nthompson777/qts-spa-starterkit .

See Angular Code Examples

For Angular Font QTS to work with Treeshaking (only load the icons that you need/use for your app), you must import 'angular-fontawesome': 

import { FontAwesomeModule } from '@fortawesome/angular-fontawesome';

Note: All icons inherit the parent tag/container's style properties (size, color, margins, padding, etc). Sizes range from xs (xtra-small) through 10x. 

<!-- component.html HTML -->
<fa-icon [icon]="faTrain01" size="2x" class="color"></fa-icon>  <fa-icon [icon]="faTrainTracks02" size="2x"></fa-icon>


// component.ts 
import { faTrain01, faTrainTracks02 } from 'ng-font-qts/font-qts';

export class HomeComponent implements OnInit {
  ...
  faTrain01 = faTrain01;
  faTrainTracks02 = faTrainTracks02;
  ...
}
